thread.title: Johnny Depp does not want to win an Oscar
thread.title_full: Johnny Depp does not want to win an Oscar - Entertainment

author: ANI
title: Johnny Depp does not want to win an Oscar
text:
London: Johnny Depp is satisfied with his Oscar nominations and does not want to win an Oscar ever.


Johnny Depp. Pic/Santa Banta 
In an interview, the 'Black Mass' actor said that he doesn't want to win one of those things (Oscar) ever, adding that the idea of winning means that you were in competition with someone, The Independent reports.
The 52-year-old actor said that he was not in competition with anybody.
Earlier, Depp was nominated for his roles in the first Pirates of the Caribbean, Finding Neverland and Sweeney Todd.
'Black Mass' has got thumbs up from the critics and is in cinemas in the United States.
